verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>, When a man shall <S%H6381>accomplish<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%>, the <S%H5315>persons<s%> shall be for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> by thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%>.

And thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be of the <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> even unto <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, even thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.
And if it be a <S%H5347>female<s%>, then thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>.

And if it be from <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> even unto <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, then thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be of the <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>.

And if it be from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> even unto <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, then thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be of the <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And if it be from <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>; if it be a <S%H2145>male<s%>, then thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>.

But if he be <S%H4134>poorer<s%> than thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%>, then he shall be <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>value<s%> <S%H6310>him<s%>; according to the <S%H3027>ability<s%> of him that <S%H5087>vowed<s%> shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> value <S%H6186>him<s%>.

And if it be a <S%H929>beast<s%>, whereof men <S%H7126>offer<s%> an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, all that any man <S%H5414>giveth<s%> of such unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

He shall not <S%H2498>alter<s%> <S%H4171>it<s%>, nor change <S%H2896>it<s%>, a good for a <S%H7451>bad<s%>, or a <S%H7451>bad<s%> for a <S%H2896>good<s%>: and if he shall at <S%H4171>all<s%> <S%H4171>change<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> for <S%H929>beast<s%>, then both it and that for which it is <S%H8545>changed<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

And if it be any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%>, of which they do not <S%H7126>offer<s%> an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, then he shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>;

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>value<s%> <S%H996>it<s%>, whether it be <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H996>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad<s%>: as thou the <S%H3548>priest<s%> valuest <S%H6187>it<s%>, so shall it be.
But if he will <S%H1350>indeed<s%> <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H3254>it<s%>, then he shall add the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof unto thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%>.

And when a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>estimate<s%> <S%H2896>it<s%>, whether it be good or <S%H7451>bad<s%>: as the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>estimate<s%> <S%H6965>it<s%>, so shall it stand.

And if he that <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%>, then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money<s%> of thy estimation unto <S%H6187>it<s%>, and it shall be his.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> part of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of his <S%H272>possession<s%>, then thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H6310>according<s%> to the <S%H2233>sowing<s%> <S%H2233>thereof<s%>: the sowing of a <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> shall be valued at <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
If he <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> from the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>, according to thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> it shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>.

But if he <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> unto him the <S%H3701>money<s%> according <S%H6310>to<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> that <S%H3498>remain<s%> unto the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>; and an <S%H1639>abatement<s%> shall be made from thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%>.

And if he that <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> will <S%H1350>indeed<s%> <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H3254>it<s%>, then he shall add the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money<s%> of thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> unto <S%H6965>it<s%>, and it shall be assured to him.

And if he will not <S%H1350>redeem<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%>, or if he have <S%H4376>sold<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, it shall not be redeemed any <S%H1350>more<s%>:

but the <S%H7704>field<s%>, when it goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>, shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, as a <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H2764>devoted<s%>; the <S%H272>possession<s%> thereof shall be the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s.
And if he <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> a <S%H7704>field<s%> which he hath <S%H4736>bought<s%>, which is not of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of his <S%H272>possession<s%>;

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> unto him the <S%H4373>worth<s%> of thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> unto the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>: and he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> thine <S%H6187>estimation<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, as a holy <S%H6944>thing<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

In the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto him of whom it was <S%H7069>bought<s%>, even to him to whom the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the land <S%H776>belongeth<s%>.
And all thy <S%H6187>estimations<s%> shall be according to the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>: <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%> shall be the <S%H8255>shekel<s%>.

Only the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> among <S%H929>beasts<s%>, which is made a <S%H1069>firstling<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, no <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H7794>it<s%>; whether it be ox or <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, it is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s.

And if it be of an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%>, then he shall <S%H6299>ransom<s%> it according to thine <S%H6187>estimation<s%>, and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> unto it the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part <S%H1350>thereof<s%>: or if it be not redeemed, then it shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> according to thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%>.

Notwithstanding <S%H2764><s%>, no devoted thing, that a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H2763>devote<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of all that he <S%H120>hath<s%>, whether of man or <S%H929>beast<s%>, or of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of his <S%H272>possession<s%>, shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> or <S%H1350>redeemed<s%>: every devoted <S%H2764>thing<s%> is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
No one <S%H2764>devoted<s%>, that shall <S%H3808>be<s%> <S%H2764>devoted<s%> from among <S%H120>men<s%>, shall be <S%H6299>ransomed<s%>; he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And all the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, whether of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, or of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%>, is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s: it is <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And if a <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H1350>aught<s%> of his <S%H4643>tithe<s%>, he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> unto it the fifth part <S%H2549>thereof<s%>.

And all the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd<s%> or the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, whatsoever <S%H5674>passeth<s%> under the <S%H7626>rod<s%>, the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

He shall not <S%H1239>search<s%> whether it be <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad<s%>, neither shall he <S%H4171>change<s%> <S%H4171>it<s%>: and if he change it at <S%H4171>all<s%>, then both it and that for which it is <S%H8545>changed<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%>; it shall not be <S%H1350>redeemed<s%>.

These are the <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.
